amendment.description: Amendment allocates $1 million to FEMA to implement an identity verification system that assures disaster assistance payments are made only to qualified individuals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce FEMA waste, fraud and abuse with respect to identity verification.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jindal amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Jindal.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jindal amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
